Package ca.concordia.gameengine

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
ca.concordia.gameengine.GameEngine
public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
Game Engine class that starts with "loadmap" command and automatically ends after mainloop phases

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.lang.String COMMAND_ASSIGN_COUNTRIES
    this method is used to assign countries to different players in the game
    static java.lang.String COMMAND_EDIT_CONTINENT
    Map Editor Commands: These are global data members corresponding to which a command is associated editcontinent: in the switch case if this command corresponds to case then the corresponding command is called from the Phase.java file
    static java.lang.String COMMAND_EDIT_COUNTRY
    editcountry: in the switch case if this command corresponds to case then the corresponding command is called from the Phase.java file
    static java.lang.String COMMAND_EDIT_MAP
    editmap: in the switch case if this command corresponds to case then the corresponding command is called from the Phase.java file
    static java.lang.String COMMAND_EDIT_NEIGHBOUR
    editneighbor: in the switch case if this command corresponds to case then the corresponding command is called from the Phase.java file
    static java.lang.String COMMAND_GAME_PLAYER
    This command is a gameplayer command and players are added in player list using addPlayer() method
    static java.lang.String COMMAND_LOAD_MAP
    loadMap command loads the map to start the game, it checks if the map with the input name already exists then it loads that specified file otherwise it creates a new map Implementation of code can be found in PlaySetup classset
    static java.lang.String COMMAND_QUIT
    When this command is executed then "break" is performed which pulls out from the execution
    static java.lang.String COMMAND_SAVE_MAP
    savemap: in the switch case if this command corresponds to case then the corresponding command is called from the Phase.java file
    static java.lang.String COMMAND_SHOW_MAP
    showMap method is called which prints different attributes of the map like ID, Name etc
    static java.lang.String COMMAND_VALIDATE_MAP
    validatemap: in the switch case if this command corresponds to case then the corresponding command is called from the Phase.java file

      public ca.concordia.patterns.state.Phase getPhase()

      d_GamePhase returns the current game phase

      This setter method is used to set the phase returned from getPhase method
      Parameters:
      p_Phase - sets the Phase

    • start

      public void start()
      Main game engine used a method to GameEngine constructor Main class It takes input from the user to enter the phase Following three phases are presented: 1. Edit 2. Play 3. Quit And from the input option phase is loaded and functions are implemented
